questions.question: What is the predominant color of the bottle's main body?
What color is the cap or lid at the top of the bottle?
What is the overall shape of the plastic container?
What material appears to constitute the bottle?
Considering the bottle's form, what is its likely intended function?
Is the surface of the bottle glossy or matte in appearance?
Does the bottle exhibit any noticeable texture beyond smoothness?
Are there any prominent images, logos, or designs printed on the bottle?
What is the approximate size of the visible barcode on the back?
Describe the type of lettering used for the product information on the back?
What seems to be the primary language of the text on the bottle?
How many lines of text are approximately visible on the back label?
Does the bottle appear to have any significant imperfections or damage?
Is the cap visibly attached or separate from the bottle itself?
Considering its size and shape, is the bottle likely squeezable?
